**Example 1: 查询Task任务**



Input: 

```
tccli ecm QueryVpcTaskResult --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --TaskId 92126c28-17f4-4c93-b295-fed5d759f2f9
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Status": "SUCCESS",
        "Output": "SUCCESS",
        "RequestId": "92122228-17f4-4f93-4295-fe32d759f2f9"
    }
}
```
